phrs.translation: 突出的烛台, 壁突式烛台, 头盖, 陶瓷壁灯座
走廊双壁灯, 走廊双体遮蔽, 走廊双斯康斯
意念转动物体魔术教学

sentences.sentence: By knocking his sconce against them, sure.
sentences.translation: 用他的头脑撞过，准是的。

sentences.sentence: Solution: Install a wall sconce inside your linen closet or storage cabinet.
sentences.translation: 解决方法：在你的壁橱或者存储的柜橱里装置一个墙面突出的烛台。

sentences.sentence: "Get out of this! " cried the officer, swinging his club. "I'll give ye a bat on the sconce. Back, now. "
sentences.translation: “滚开！”警察喊道，挥舞着警棍。“我要给你脑门上来一棍子。快后退。”
